buddyMcLean.name: Buddy McLean
buddyMcLean.description: Stand Summon: American Pie. When I am played, choose 2 enemy cards to silence. If there are less than 2 cards to silence, instead deal 5 damage to the enemy

americanPie.name: American Pie
americanPie.description: Every time an enemy card is silenced, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. This damage is increased by 1 every time an enemy is silenced
